alert.note: Alert for Houston; Macon; Peach (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 09 at 9:18AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Macon, southeastern Peach and southwestern Houston Counties through 945 AM EST... At 917 AM EST, a strong thunderstorm was near Montezuma, or near Oglethorpe, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Perry, Montezuma, Marshallville, Saint Louis, Hayneville, Meadowdale, Houston Lake, Grovania, Elko, Grove Park, Moss Oak, Winchester, Miami Valley, Henderson and Clinchfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM EST for central and west central Georgia.
